Transport for Greater Manchester decided to start publishing real time data in 2016. The documentation for the API can be found [here](http://www.tfgm.com/Corporate/Informationwehold/Pages/Transparency-and-Open-Data.aspx).

You suscribe to the API, then you can use the data.
